COMMIT.MESSAGE: podman cp: fix copying with "." suffix Fix a bug for special-casing "." where Podman has mistakenly been looking for a "." suffix instead of interpreting it as a path. Add regression tests for the host-to-container, container-to-host and container-to-container use cases. Have separate tests for each to verify that previous Podman versions fail each case. Fixes: #16421 Signed-off-by: Valentin Rothberg <vrothberg@redhat.com>
